sql.statement: select user_id, ts, level, subject_id, subject_name, type, details, case when position('version' in details) > 0 then 'App start: ' || substr(details, position('version' in details) + 8, 14) else substr(details, 0, 20) end as details_short, case when type='Perspective Switch' then substr(details, position('Areas' in details) + 7, position(']' in details) - position('Areas' in details) -7) else '' end as areas, abs(extract(epoch from (ts - lead(ts) over (partition by user_id, type order by ts)))/60) as diff, seq_num from activity where details != '' and  ts > ?
